name: SharePhotoContentPhotoParams
summary: Parameters to pass to the images property of the presentPhotoShareDialog method.

properties.name: caption
properties.summary: The user generated caption for the photo. Note that the 'caption' must come from the user, as pre-filled content is forbidden by the Platform Policies (2.3).

properties.name: photo
properties.summary: The (required) photo. Can either be a file on the local disk (represented as a Titanium.Blob) or a photo URL (represented as a String).
